meanings.sent1: She impledges to always help her friends in need.
meanings.sent2: He impledges to be honest in all his dealings.
meanings.sent3: The cat impledges to catch all the mice in the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun impledges to shine brightly every day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher impledges to guide her students to success.

meanings.definition: A pledge or promise made by someone
meanings.sent1: His impledges were always sincere and heartfelt.
meanings.sent2: The impledges of loyalty were sworn by the knights.
meanings.sent3: The impledges of the children to finish their homework were amusingly dramatic.
meanings.sent4: The impledges of love echoed through the room like sweet music.
meanings.sent5: The impledges of the athletes to give their best were inspiring.
